channel.title: CVE Feed for GNU binutils -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for GNU binutils -- all products

item.title: CVE-2019-1010204|2024-08-05T03:07:18.485Z -- gnu%20binutils -- gold
item.description: GNU binutils gold gold v1.11-v1.16 (GNU binutils v2.21-v2.31.1) is affected by: Improper Input Validation, Signed/Unsigned Comparison, Out-of-bounds Read. The impact is: Denial of service. The component is: gold/fileread.cc:497, elfcpp/elfcpp_file.h:644. The attack vector is: An ELF file with an invalid e_shoff header field must be opened.
